=====
VPGAA
=====

'VPGAA' is not a real instrument.  This 'instrument' can be used in the
``nicos-demo`` script as a virtual copy of the 'PGAA' instrument.

It can also be used as a quick development environment.

=================

    :glob:

    setups/*
